title: 015: Social Media & Anarchy
description: Mindpump, mindpumpradio.com, Sal Di Stefano, Adam Schafer, Justin Andrews, Doug Egge, social media, anarchy, free market, online education, free market, decentralization, online universities, 4 year degrees, Technology is growing lightening fast. With this growth comes both tremendous opportunity and a dark side. In this episode Sal, Adam and Justin explore where the information age is taking us and how to take advantage of the opportunity it offers.
